title: Apple Announces 2024 Swift Student Challenge with New Distinguished Winners Category and Educational Resources
originSummary: Apple has unveiled its upcoming Swift Student Challenge, a coding and app development contest for students, launching in February 2024.

The competition will incorporate a new category for 50 Distinguished Winners invited to visit Apple's headquarters and all 350 winners receive a one-year complimentary membership to the Apple Developer Program.

Additionally, Apple is rolling out new educational resources to facilitate app design and coding tutorials to children, in cooperation with entities such as the National Coalition of Certification Centers (NC3).
commentSummary: Apple has divulged its upcoming Swift Student Challenge, a contest for students focusing on coding and app development, set to begin in February 2024.

In addition to the main competition, a new category will recognize 50 notable winners, offering them an invitation to visit Apple's headquarters while all 350 winners receive a one-year free membership to the Apple Developer Program.

To further support young learners and educators, Apple is introducing teaching resources for app design and coding, anticipating their significance in future job markets, with extended assistance planned from groups such as the National Coalition of Certification Centers (NC3).
